fr.escape.game.message

Interface Sender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UIWeapons, User

    public interface Sender

    An interface for components which send message to Receiver.

    If you need complex communication ability, DO NOT use this interface.

    A message is an integer which have to be handle by the implementation of this Interface.

    Sender and Receiver must be agreed about Communication Specification.

    See Also:
    Receiver

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void register(Receiver receiver)
      Register a Receiver for receiving Message.
      void send(int message)
      Send a message to one/all Receiver.
